#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,i,mid,ans;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        vector<int> v(n);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&(v[i]));
        }
        if(n%2)
        {
            if(n==1)
                ans=v[0];
            else
            {
                sort(v.begin(),v.end());
                mid=n/2;
                if((v[mid]==v[mid-1])||(v[mid]==v[mid+1]))
                    ans=-1;
                else
                    ans=v[mid];
            }
            printf("%d\n",ans);
        }
        else
            printf("-1\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
